title: How the pandemic will change schools when they reopen
description: Frazzled parents, anxious teachers and many children are already looking forward to the day when schools will reopen but it's not an easy road. CNN's Laura Jarrett reports.

author: Ryan Prior, CNN
title: Some island lizard species evolve to survive hurricanes -- the key is bigger toe pads
description: A new study shows lizards that evolve larger toe pads are more likely to survive hurricanes. That adaptation could be helpful as climate change increases the frequency of severe storms.
source.name: CNN

author: Alicia Wallace, CNN Business
title: Lakers return $4.6 million coronavirus relief loan
description: The Los Angeles Lakers has repaid a $4.6 million coronavirus relief loan the professional basketball organization received as part of the federal government's Paycheck Protection Program.

author: Ryan Nobles, Kevin Liptak and Kaitlan Collins, CNN
title: White House document says federal government is a test 'supplier of last resort'
description: The White House says the federal government should act as the "supplier of last resort" for coronavirus tests as it works with states to ramp up a testing regime that health experts say is necessary before a national reopening.

author: Nectar Gan, CNN
title: China is installing surveillance camera outside people's front doors ... and sometimes inside their homes
description: The pandemic has brought surveillance cameras closer to people's private lives: from public spaces in the city to the front doors of their homes -- and in some rare cases, surveillance cameras inside their apartments.
content:
I can't bear the thought that our everyday lives are completely exposed to the government's scrutiny.
William Zhou, Changzhou resident
source.name: CNN

author: Theresa Waldrop and Melanie Schuman, CNN
title: Harvard will reopen this fall, although remote learning may continue, provost says
description: Harvard will be open for the fall semester, but some or all instruction may continue to be online, the university's provost said Monday.
source.name: CNN

author: Ryan Nobles and Dan Merica, CNN
title: Trump's coronavirus response has Republicans worried about November's election
description: President Donald Trump's response to the coronavirus pandemic has upended Republican plans for how to run against Democrats in races up and down the ballot this year.
source.name: CNN

author: Fredreka Schouten, CNN
title: White House-allied conservatives band together to support economic reopening
description: Conservatives announce "Save Our Country" task force to lobby for reopening the economy and tax cuts. The group will oppose federal aid to state and local governments stretched thin by the fight to coronavirus.
source.name: CNN

author: Nikki Carvajal and Maegan Vazquez, CNN
title: Trump said he takes no responsibility for the spike in people using disinfectants improperly
description: President Donald Trump said Monday that he takes no responsibility for a spike in people using disinfectants improperly after dangerously suggesting last week that ingesting it could serve as a coronavirus treatment.

title: Tesla's latest Autopilot feature is slowing down for green lights, too

title: The largest-ever Arctic ozone hole developed this spring. Now, scientists say it's closed.
description: An ozone hole that formed over the Arctic this spring and eventually grew into the largest ever recorded there has closed.
content:
